# fkWeightPerAxis

**Instance Property**

The per-axis weight of the FK demand on the joint.

## Declaration

```swift
var fkWeightPerAxis: SIMD3<Float>
```

## Discussion

Values are in the closed range `[0, 1]`, where `0` means no influence, and `1` is maximum influence.
title: fkWeightPerAxis
